snippet: The second most successful team at the Edgar Kaplan Winter Regional in Manhattan last month was Justine Cushing, Melih Ozdil and Joel Wooldridge of New York City, and Adam Kaplan of New Port Richey, Fla.
abstract: Phillip Alder bridge column on deal played at Edgar Kaplan Winter Regional in New York City.
lead_paragraph: The second most successful team at the Edgar Kaplan Winter Regional in Manhattan last month was Justine Cushing, Melih Ozdil and Joel Wooldridge of New York City, and Adam Kaplan of New Port Richey, Fla.

headline.seo: Bridge - Edgar Kaplan Winter Regional in Manhattan
headline.main: Edgar Kaplan Winter Regional in Manhattan
